OOC: Damn right that the Alliance story is unbelievable!  Like the rules
say, unless you get Zardus' permission for that silly story, the Alliance
never did anything to Mustex, Stallex, Rhesus or the Carnitrons.  Oh, and if
you really want to write stuff that's actually worth reading(And no, I
didn't enjoy your silly little story) then you can always look for some
advice from Jeff, sometimes me, KSL and a few others most likely.  You'll
need to gain a more complex vocabulary and more understanding of things.
Ok, everything I just said probably sounds really weird right now, but jume
it.  Speak up if you really wanna **** with the Abyssian Badass!  And,
everybody, since there's a lot of OOCing going on, I suggest you be like me
and learn to balance OOCing and ICing by putting them both into one post.
*Speeds off on his Harley* =)

BIC:   Decadel continued to roam the halls and corridors of Maximal City.

          "Errr...must find.....somebody to enslave....soon!" Decadel said
to himself.

          Decadel walked on, pondering who he should enslave.
